dashboard.description: Monitor your Apache JMeter load test and server-side Openshift performance in real time

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT max("sb") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT "pct95.0" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transactions_filter$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("statut" = 'ok' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: All Transactions Mean Response Times (95th pct)

targets.query: SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" != 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" != 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$server_cluster", namespace="$server_namespace", container!=""}* on(namespace,pod)  group_left(workload) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$server_cluster", namespace="$server_namespace"}) by (workload)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction"

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "responseCode","responseMessage"

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("count") AS "error" FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT last("count") / $send_interval FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct50.0") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct99.0") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("max") FROM "$jmeter_measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$jmeter_transaction_details$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: jmeter_application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "application"

list.name: jmeter_testId
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "testId"

list.name: jmeter_transaction_details
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$jmeter_application$/ AND "testId" =~ /^$jmeter_testId$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

dashboard.title: JMeter+Openshift Dashboard
